summary.header: Market Locations Inventory Management Application (MLiMa) Frame-works Package Edition {2021} (February 21)
summary.article: LibraryDB.cs interface DataRetrieval{ string ReadData(); } // Enforces Derived Class to Contain Signature public class DBroutines : DataRetrieval // Required to Allow Usage private string _data = String.Empty; // Internal Usage public string ReadData(int Character) // Localized Common Conduit public void Display() // Part of Unit Testing Group static void Main(){} // Required

MLiMaController.cs public class ControllerRoutines // Required to Allow Usage private string _data = String.Empty; // Internal Usage public void Selection(int Character) // Required to Allow Usage public void Display() // Part of Unit Testing Group

MLiMaView.cs public class ViewRoutines private string _data = "Welcome to the MLiMa Order Center"; // Internal Usage of Storing a Title public void MenuInterface(int MenuLogic) // Menu Prompts char UserSelection = Console.ReadKey(false).KeyChar; // Get Character or Character Code bool Selection = false; // Flow Logic public void Display() // Part of Unit Testing Group

MLiMa.cs public class ApplicationProgrammingInterface // Required to Allow Usage static void Main() // Required to Run Applicational Program static bool StructuralIntegrityUTintegration() // Unit Testing Group
